==Useful Info==
'''Vault guards''' are stout warriors found in [[the Vaults]], occasionally guarding its entrance, or the entrance to a [[treasure trove]]. They tend to wield powerful, occasionally-[[brand]]ed weapons and sometimes shields. On their own, they're about as dangerous as an [[orc knight]], but they tend to be found in bands alongside [[ironbound preserver]]s, [[ironbound convoker]]s, and/or [[vault warden]]s. You are guaranteed to face a horde of them upon entering the fifth and final floor of the Vaults.

==Tips & Tricks==
*Although not particularly terrifying, they can land decently powerful hits, particularly when armed with well-branded gear. Try not to take on too many at once.
*Their [[willpower]] is not that great. Confusing, enslaving, or petrifying them is not a bad idea. In case of emergency, bring a [[scroll of fear]] to send most of them running.

[[Category:Human]]
